rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BUS1100, ETB1100, ETC1000, ETG1102, ETP1100, ETW1000, ETW1102, ETX1100, PMM2020, SCI1020, STA1010}

Unit was previously coded {7191, DEB164, DEB1640, DEB1640C, DEB1643, DEE1640, DEE1640B, DEE1640BF, DEE1640C, DEE1640M, DEE1640R, DEE1640RM, DEE1640S, DEE1640SM, ECM1640, ECM1640S, ECN1640, ETF1640, ETF1640B, ETF1640M, ETF1640R, ETF1640S, ETF1640W, ETP1100, ETS1100, ETW1020, ETW1102%, ETW1640, ETX1100%, ETX1640%, ETX1642%, FIN164, FIN1640%, FIN166, FIN1660, GAS1751%}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: Topics include an introduction to spreadsheeting; descriptive statistics; elementary probability; discrete and continuous probability distributions; statistical inference; simple linear regression and correlation; forecasting and time series; and Index numbers.
